##Angola.txt

#Angola : Angola (464000)
#Ruled by Portugal in 1836
#Luanda (164000/41000 POPS)
1999 = {
	aristocrats = {
		culture = portuguese
		religion = catholic
		size = 150
	}

	clergymen = {
		culture = portuguese
		religion = catholic
		size = 50
	}

	artisans = {
		culture = portuguese
		religion = catholic
		size = 500
	}

	soldiers = {
		culture = portuguese
		religion = catholic
		size = 100
